articles.author: VANESSA GERA
articles.title: At Auschwitz memorial, survivors see echoes of the past in rising antisemitism - The Associated Press
articles.description: Auschwitz survivors have warned of the rising antisemitism and hatred in the modern world as they gathered with world leaders and European royalty on the 80th anniversary of the death camp’s liberation. In all, 56 survivors gathered under a huge tent on Monda…
articles.content: OSWIECIM, Poland (AP) Auschwitz survivors warned Monday of the rising antisemitism and hatred they are witnessing in the modern world as they gathered with world leaders and European royalty on the 8… [+5383 chars]
